mapper.select: select * from notice order by noticeno desc
select * from notice where noticeno = #{ noticeno }
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, noticeno, noticetitle, noticedate FROM (SELECT * FROM NOTICE ORDER BY noticeno DESC)) WHERE RNUM >= 1 AND RNUM <= 3
select * from notice where noticetitle like '%' || #{ keyword } || '%'
select * from notice where noticewriter like '%' || #{ keyword } || '%'
select * from notice where noticedate between #{ begin } and #{ end }
mapper.insert: insert into notice (noticeno, noticetitle, noticewriter, noticecontent, noticedate, original_filepath, rename_filepath) values ((select max(noticeno) + 1 from notice), #{ noticetitle }, #{ noticewriter }, #{noticecontent}, sysdate, #{ original_filepath, jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{ rename_filepath, jdbcType=VARCHAR })
mapper.delete: delete from notice where noticeno = #{ noticeno }
